data: Thank you for providing the pizza size and type. You have ordered a small marinara pizza. If you need anything else, feel free to let me know!
At Fast Pizza, we focus on providing delicious pizzas, but we don't offer drinks like Mai Tai in cans.
The delivery time for your small marinara pizza typically ranges from 30 to 45 minutes, depending on your location and current demand.
The cost of a small marinara pizza at Fast Pizza is $8.99.
